Others: The Golden State Warriors lost to the Sacramento Kings by 30 points, their 14th loss in their last 20 games.
Stephen Curry expressed concern about the team's ability to come back from large deficits following the loss.
The Warriors are struggling with a 16.7 PPG average from Andrew Wiggins, a dropoff in productivity from Buddy Hield, and the loss of Jonathan Kuminga for three weeks due to an ankle sprain.
